SELECT user_id,name,book_id,book_name,user.name name,borrow_time,deadline,valid_time,borrow_stutas,return_time FROM user INNER JOIN (SELECT book.book_id book_id,book_name,borrow_time,deadline,valid_time,borrow_stutas,return_time FROM borrow INNER JOIN book ON book.book_id=borrow.book_id where user_id=#{userId} and borrow_stutas=1) book_borrow ON user.user_id=#{userId}
mapper.delete: delete user,borrow from user left join borrow on user.user_id=borrow.user_id where user.user_id=#{userId};
mapper.update: update user set password=#{user.password} where user_id=#{user.userId}
